attributes.value: Respects power
Values honesty
Finds eloquence and artful speech off-putting
Sees life as unfair and doesn't mind it that way
Finds maintaining decorum a silly, fumbling waste of time
Values artwork
Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless
Finds sacrifice to be the height of folly
Finds leisure time wasteful
Almost never feels discouraged
Has great trouble mastering fear when confronted by danger
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Takes no pleasure in her talents and appearance
Does not feel the slightest need to reciprocate favors that others do for her, no matter how major the help or how much she needed it
Tends to hang on to grievances
Is generally unhindered by the thoughts of others concerning her actions
Is made deeply uncomfortable by differences in culture or appearance
Hates vows, obligations, promises and other binding elements that could restrict her
Is sloppy with her living space
Likes a little excitement now and then
Is given to flights of fancy to the point of distraction
Is moved by art and natural beauty
Very weak
Clumsy
A good intellect
A feel for music
